CustomField.formula: Additional_Information__c & IF(AND(NOT(ISBLANK(Venue__c)),Venue__c <> Course__r.Main_Venue__c), "This session will be held at " & Venue__r.Name & Venue__r.Street_Address__c & Venue__r.Town__c & Venue__r.County__c & Venue__r.Postcode__c, "" )
CustomField.label: Additional Information with Venue
